description: Period of repeating digits of 1/n in base 5.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..1000
Index entries for sequences related to decimal expansion of 1/n
mathematica: f[n_] := MultiplicativeOrder[5, n/(5^IntegerExponent[n, 5])]; Array[f, 80] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jun 10 2011 *)
prog: (PARI) A007736(n,bas)={ local(p) ; for(sp=2,1000000, for(s=1,sp-1, p=sp-s ; if( ((bas^p-1)*bas^s) % n == 0, return(p) ; ) ; ) ; ) ; return(-1) ; } { for(n=1,100, print(n," ",A007736(n,5)) ; ) ; } - _R. J. Mathar_, Aug 30 2006(PARI) a(n)=znorder(Mod(5,n/5^valuation(n,5))) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jun 10 2011
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Hal Sampson (hals(AT)easynet.com), _David W. Wilson_
